        private java.util.ArrayList<ImageInfo> getListInternal(int maxReceiveEntry,
                                             java.lang.String token)
        Acquire media file list (limited number of items)
        Parameters:
        maxReceiveEntry - Maximum number of files that can be acquired at once
        token - Set the previously acquired token to continue. Set null if acquiring for the first time.
        Returns:
        List of specified number of media files

      • takePicture

        public HttpConnector.ShootResult takePicture(HttpEventListener listener)
        Take photo

        After shooting, the status is checked for each CHECK_STATUS_PERIOD_MS and the listener notifies you of the status.

        Parameters:
        listener - Post-shooting event listener
        Returns:
        Shooting request results
